# unifi_radius_profile (Data Source)

Retrieves information about an existing UniFi RADIUS profile. Lookup by either id or name. Note: auth_server and acct_server are not exposed as they contain write-only secret fields.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the RADIUS profile. Specify either id or name.
- `name` (String) The name of the RADIUS profile. Specify either id or name.

### Read-Only

- `interim_update_enabled` (Boolean) Enable interim accounting updates.
- `interim_update_interval` (Number) Interval in seconds between interim accounting updates.
- `site_id` (String) The site ID where the RADIUS profile exists.
- `use_usg_acct_server` (Boolean) Use the USG/UDM as the accounting server.
- `use_usg_auth_server` (Boolean) Use the USG/UDM as the authentication server.
- `vlan_enabled` (Boolean) Enable VLAN assignment via RADIUS.
- `vlan_wlan_mode` (String) VLAN WLAN mode. Valid values: disabled, optional, required.
